snippet: The Audit Bureau of Circulations, an organization devoted to the data and decimal points of audits, is adopting a new identity. It will become the Alliance for Audited Media.
abstract: Advertising column observes the Audit Bureau of Circulations, organization devoted to the data and decimal points of audits, is adopting a new identity, becoming the Alliance for Audited Media.
lead_paragraph: The Audit Bureau of Circulations, an organization devoted to the data and decimal points of audits, is adopting a new identity. It will become the Alliance for Audited Media.

headline.seo: Renaming the Audit Bureau of Circulations
